columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the data quality ruleset.

columns.name: database_name
columns.description: The name of the database where the glue table exists.

columns.name: table_name
columns.description: The name of the glue table.

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: The date and time the data quality ruleset was created.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description of the data quality ruleset.

columns.name: last_modified_on
columns.description: The date and time the data quality ruleset was last modified.

columns.name: recommendation_run_id
columns.description: When a ruleset was created from a recommendation run, this run ID is generated to link the two together.

columns.name: rule_count
columns.description: The number of rules in the ruleset.

columns.name: rule_set
columns.description: A Data Quality Definition Language (DQDL) ruleset.

columns.name: target_table
columns.description: An object representing a glue table.
